protective_factors: Denial of active intent or plan
risk_factors: Presence of current passive suicidal ideation (wish to disappear)
Significant vegetative symptoms (early morning awakening, weight loss, anergia)
clinical_actions: Implement psychoeducation regarding delayed effect of SSRI dose increase.
Ensure family is aware of risk status and knows crisis contact information.
Schedule close follow-up (e.g., check-in call within 72 hours, follow-up appointment within 1-2 weeks).
